title: Good day, gentlemen. Problem with Pixel 2 xl. After the update, he does not see the operating syste
content: Good day, gentlemen. Problem with Pixel 2 xl. After the update, he does not see the operating system, he can not enter the recovery either, he writes the same thing. The main problem is that it is impossible to install and do anything with the phone without debugging via USB and Factory unlock. Advise what to do?
